common_0240_teacher_01:
Temos algumas notícias interessantes. Quem
quer ouvir? [npcn:2A]
common_0240_student_07: Oooooooh! Eu! Eu quero ouvir as notícias!
common_0240_teacher_02:
I suppose I should have told you sooner, but
we have a new little friend joining our happy\r
homeroom as of today.[npcn:2A]
common_0240_student_02: I wonder what they’ll be like?
common_0240_teacher_03: All right! You can come on in![npcn:2A]
common_0240_teacher_04:
Could I trouble you for a few words introducing
yourself?[npcn:2A]
common_0240_student_03a:
Did you hear that? [H;Sh:g]e seems super friendly
and fun!
common_0240_student_03b: So calm and collected! [H;Sh:g]e’s pretty cool!
common_0240_teacher_05:
Looks like everyone’s eager to get to know you,
[trnm:0].[npcn:2A]
common_0240_teacher_06:
All right, then. Who wants to be the first to ask
our new friend a question?[npcn:2A]
common_0240_student_m_01: Me! Me! Can I ask a question?!
common_0240_student_m_02: What’s your favorite thing about Pokémon?
common_0240_select_08: I like playing with my Pokémon
common_0240_student_m_03: Really? Awesome! I’m totally the same!
common_0240_teacher_07:
Does anyone else have a question for their
new classmate?[npcn:2A]
common_0240_rival_02:
You went to all the trouble of enrolling here, so
spill, [trnm:0]...[npcn:4]
common_0240_rival_03:
What do you hope to get out of it? You must
have some kind of dream, right?[npcn:4]
common_0240_select_09: I want to complete the Pokédex
common_0240_select_10: I want to be a strong Trainer
common_0240_rival_03a:
I’m glad I got you set up with that Pokédex app if
you like collecting that much![npcn:4]
common_0240_rival_03b:
You will be! Oh, I just know it! You and me—
we’re going to get so strong battling together![npcn:4]
common_0240_rival_03c:
Fair, I get it! The possibilities are endless, right?
Who can decide![npcn:4]
common_0240_teacher_08:
Well, thank you for telling us a bit about
yourself, [trnm:0].\c
I’m Mr. Jacq. I teach biology here at the
academy, and I’m also your homeroom teacher.[npcn:2A]
common_0240_teacher_09: That’s your seat. Second row from the front.[npcn:2A]
common_0240_teacher_10:
All right, you ragamuffins. Be nice and friendly
to our new classmate![npcn:2A]
common_0240_system_01:
Get to know the academy campus by exploring a
bit on your own!
common_0240_student_m_a: Yo, new kid! Glad to have you!
common_0240_student_m_b:
When class is in session, we tend to be on our
best behavior. But our best still isn’t that good!
common_0240_student_m_c: Wh-what, you want to talk to me?!
common_0240_student_f_a: Thanks for answering my question earlier!
common_0240_student_f_c:
Looking for Nemona? She got called to the staff
room just now.
